Method Detail

learnEntity

public IDevice learnEntity(long macAddress,
                           java.lang.Short vlan,
                           java.lang.Integer ipv4Address,
                           java.lang.Long switchDPID,
                           java.lang.Integer switchPort,
                           boolean processUpdates)
Learn a device using the given characteristics.

Parameters:
macAddress - the MAC
vlan - the VLAN (can be null)
ipv4Address - the IP (can be null)
switchDPID - the attachment point switch DPID (can be null)
switchPort - the attachment point switch port (can be null)
processUpdates - if false, will not send updates. Note that this method is not thread safe if this is false
Returns:
the device, either new or not

public IDevice learnEntity(long macAddress,

                           java.lang.Integer switchPort)
Learn a device using the given characteristics.

Parameters:
macAddress - the MAC
vlan - the VLAN (can be null)
ipv4Address - the IP (can be null)
switchDPID - the attachment point switch DPID (can be null)
switchPort - the attachment point switch port (can be null)
Returns:
the device, either new or not
